Content-type: text/plain;
	charset="US-ASCII"
Content-transfer-encoding: 7bit

Hello,

Sometimes we face the problem of hang up threads in Heritrix job that may
suspend the whole job. I investigated in this issue and came with a method
to kill these threads. I would like to share the idea with you and looking
forward for your feedback if there is any concern or if there are other
methods that I may add to the post.

http://a-alsum.blogspot.com/2014/08/killing-hang-up-threads-in-heritrix.html

Best regards,
Ahmed AlSum, Ph.D.
Web Archiving Engineer
Digital Library System and Services
Stanford University Library
Work: 650-868-7449




--B_3491974133_22795825
